participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, enjoys music and the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I am in high school. I sleep a lot. I cs and ds. I love sweets. I love Bruno Mars.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Playful and thoughtful, has a whimsical outlook on life.
participant_2.background: I cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows. I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat. I hate cleaning up after my husband and children. To free my mind from feeling depressed I look up at the stars at night. I believe in aliens.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1, I'm in high school and I love Bruno Mars.
Hi participant_2, I'm participant_2, I love lollipops and rainbows.
Me too! I love eating lollipops and playing with rainbows.
I wish I could be a professional eater and not get fat.
That would be awesome! I would love to be able to eat all the food I want without gaining weight.
Me too! I hate cleaning up after my husband and kids.
I can imagine! That must be a lot of work.
It is! But I love them so it's worth it.
To free my mind from feeling depressed I look up at the stars at night.
That's a great way to relax! I love stargazing too.
Me too! I think it's so cool that there could be other life out there in the universe.
I know right! It's so exciting to think about.
Well, it was nice chatting with you participant_2.
